parameters.name: Missing
parameters.description: Determines how missing values are handled in the average; replace with zero or ignore.

dropLowest.name: dropLowest
dropLowest.label: Drop Lowest
dropLowest.description: Average value after dropping the lowest value of the assessments

parameters.name: Missing
parameters.description: Determines how missing values are handled in the average; replace with zero or ignore.

dropNLowest.name: dropNLowest
dropNLowest.label: Drop N Lowest
dropNLowest.description: Average value after dropping the lowest N values of the assessments

parameters.name: N
parameters.description: Number of the lowest scores to drop from the average

parameters.name: Missing
parameters.description: Determines how missing values are handled in the average; replace with zero or ignore.

binaryProportion.name: binaryProportion
binaryProportion.label: Binary Proportion
binaryProportion.description: Proportion of true values, where score >= 50 is true else false

parameters.name: Missing
parameters.description: Determines how missing values are handled in the average; replace with zero or ignore.

decayedAverage.name: decayedAverage
decayedAverage.label: Time-Decayed Average
decayedAverage.description: Average score, decaying those after a deadline as score * 2^(-min(late, cap)/halving) where late is the number of minutes after the deadline. Missing values are ignored.

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: A time and date, recorded internally as a unix time.

parameters.name: halving
parameters.description: The number of minutes late at which the score is halved. Defaults to one day (1440 minutes).

parameters.name: cap
parameters.description: Maximum number of minutes late at which score is decayed. Defaults to (effective) infinity.
